File Status

You can easily check what is the translation progress of your submitted file.

Method: GET

URL: https://transfluent.com/v2/file/status/

Parameters:

identifier

language

token

Returns:

with status OK: 

{"status":"OK","response":{"progress":"11.49%","word_count":87,"word_count_translated":10}}
